Package ta4_1.MoneyFlow_Backend

Class ChatServer

java.lang.Object
ta4_1.MoneyFlow_Backend.ChatServer
@Component public class ChatServer extends Object
Represents a WebSocket chat server for handling real-time communication between users. Each user connects to the server using their unique username. This class is annotated with Spring's `@ServerEndpoint` and `@Component` annotations, making it a WebSocket endpoint that can handle WebSocket connections at the "/chat/{username}" endpoint. Example URL: ws://localhost:8080/chat/username The server provides functionality for broadcasting messages to all connected users and sending messages to specific users.
